mapper.select: SELECT id_article, nom_article, content, description_robot_article, description_article FROM astanble.article ORDER BY id_article

SELECT usager.cip, usager.nom_usager, usager.prenom_usager, usager.courriel1, usager.courriel2, nom_complet_usager FROM astanble.view_usager_wiki LEFT JOIN astanble.usager ON astanble.view_usager_wiki.cip = astanble.usager.cip WHERE id_article = #{id}::int AND nom_relation = 'Auteur'

SELECT usager.cip, usager.nom_usager, usager.prenom_usager, usager.courriel1, usager.courriel2, nom_complet_usager FROM astanble.view_usager_wiki LEFT JOIN astanble.usager ON astanble.view_usager_wiki.cip = astanble.usager.cip WHERE id_article = #{id}::int AND nom_relation = 'Auteur' OR nom_relation = 'Co-Auteur'

SELECT usager.cip, usager.nom_usager, usager.prenom_usager, usager.courriel1, usager.courriel2, nom_complet_usager FROM astanble.view_usager_wiki LEFT JOIN astanble.usager ON astanble.view_usager_wiki.cip = astanble.usager.cip WHERE id_article = #{id}::int
SELECT id_article, nom_article, content, description_robot_article, description_article FROM astanble.article WHERE LOWER(nom_article) LIKE lower('%'||#{article}||'%')

SELECT id_article, nom_article, content, cip, nom_complet_usager, -- description_robot_article, description_article FROM astanble.view_usager_wiki
WHERE lower(nom_complet_usager) like lower('%'|| #{auteur}||'%') AND type_relation.nom_relation = 'Auteur' --relation = author?
SELECT id_article, nom_article, content, description_robot_article, description_article FROM astanble.article WHERE id_article = #{id_article}::int;
SELECT * FROM astanble.article WHERE astanble.SIMILARITY(nom_article, #{nom_article}) > 0.1 ORDER BY astanble.SIMILARITY(nom_article, #{nom_article}) DESC LIMIT 100;

SELECT * FROM astanble.view_usager_wiki WHERE astanble.SIMILARITY(prenom_usager, #{prenom_usager}) > 0.1 or astanble.SIMILARITY(nom_usager, #{prenom_usager}) > 0.1 ORDER BY astanble.SIMILARITY(prenom_usager, #{prenom_usager}) DESC LIMIT 100;
SELECT * FROM astanble.article WHERE astanble.SIMILARITY(description_article, #{description_article}) > 0.1 ORDER BY astanble.SIMILARITY(description_article, #{description_article}) DESC LIMIT 100;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO astanble.article( nom_article, content, description_article) VALUES (#{article.nom_article}, #{article.content}, #{article.description_article});
INSERT INTO astanble.usager_article_collaboration( id_relation, cip, code_article) VALUES (#{id_relation}, #{cip}, #{code_article});
